actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Reserve Board should take immediate actions to facilitate prompt economic recovery.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Reserve Board should encourage lower interest rates and expand the money supply to facilitate prompt economic recovery.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Reserve Board should take immediate actions to facilitate prompt economic recovery.
